attributes.action: admit, that his legislation to ban legal hand-guns was high handed, ill thought out, and has done nothing to protect law abiding Britons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The 1997 ban was a knee jerk reaction to a terrible tragedy that could have been nipped in the bud, If public servants had had the moral courage to back their convictions with action. 
A section of the British public was criminalised and their property taken.
Now pistols are solely in the hands on the Criminals and gun crime is rampant!
